tasks_completed.changes: Deleted entire openweathermap skill directory including SKILL.md, README.md, scripts/, examples/, tools/ subdirectories
tasks_completed.rationale: QA identified orphaned openweathermap directory causing confusion despite all agent references being clean. Skill was replaced by weather skill.

tasks_completed.result: 10 skill directories remain (12306, airbnb, amadeus-flight, duffel-flights, eventbrite, gaode-maps, google-maps, test-mcp, weather, yelp)
tasks_completed.rationale: Confirm openweathermap directory no longer exists

git_rationale.root_cause: openweathermap skill was replaced by weather skill but directory was never deleted
git_rationale.why_issue_occurred: Initial focus was on updating agent references, didn't include directory cleanup in original scope
git_rationale.how_fix_addresses_root: Completely removed deprecated skill directory to eliminate source of confusion

dev.qa_notes: openweathermap directory successfully removed. Current skills: 12306, airbnb, amadeus-flight, duffel-flights, eventbrite, gaode-maps, google-maps, test-mcp, weather, yelp (10 total).

recommendations: When replacing/renaming skills, include directory cleanup in original scope
Create skill lifecycle management process (deprecation → reference updates → directory removal)
